DANISH 311 Topics in Danish Literature and Culture (5, max. 15) VLPA
Selected topics in modern Danish literature and culture, such as women's literature, Danish identity and the European Union, contemporary drama and film, or children's literature.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 311

DANISH 201 Second-Year Danish (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Review of grammar. Introduction of modern literary texts. Discussion of culture and current events in Denmark. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 201

DANISH 101 Elementary Danish (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Danish. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 101

DANISH 103 Elementary Danish (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Danish. Third in a sequence of three.

DANISH 199 Foreign Study: Elementary Danish (1-15, max. 15)
Fundamentals of oral and written Danish.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 199

DANISH 310 Topics in Danish Short Prose (5, max. 15) VLPA
Focuses on the fairy tale and story, with selections by Bicher, H.C. Andersen, Bang, Blixen, and others.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 310

DANISH 399 Foreign Study: Topics in Danish Literature and Culture (1-5, max. 15) VLPA
Topics in Danish literature, life, and civilization.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 399

DANISH 312 Topics in the Danish Novel (5, max. 15) VLPA
Focuses on selected novels from the nineteenth and twentieth centuries by figures such as J.P. Jacobsen, Herman Bang, J.V. Jensen, Hans Kirk, Scherfig and Ditlevsen.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 312

DANISH 202 Second-Year Danish (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Review of grammar. Introduction of modern literary texts. Discussion of culture and current events in Denmark. Second in a sequence of three.

DANISH 203 Second-Year Danish (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Review of grammar. Introduction of modern literary texts. Discussion of culture and current events in Denmark.Third in a sequence of three.

DANISH 490 Supervised Reading (1-5, max. 10)
Readings in a selected area of Danish language, literature, or related fields.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 490

DANISH 299 Foreign Study: Intermediate Danish (1-15, max. 15) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Functional review of grammar. Discussion of culture and current events in Denmark.
View course details in MyPlan: DANISH 299

DANISH 102 Elementary Danish (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Danish. Second in a sequence of three.

DANISH 395 Foreign Study: Danish Area Studies (1-5, max. 10) I&S
Courses in Danish history, society, and/or politics.
